General.Name: e-therapeutics plc
General.Description: e-therapeutics plc engages in drug discovery research activities in the United Kingdom. It offers HepNet, a proprietary, hepatocyte-specific, and computational biology platform that addresses key limitations of the biopharmaceutical industry, including extracting value from big data, addressing complex diseases, and improving translatability in research and development; and GalOmic, a RNA interference (RNAi) chemistry platform, which enables the generation of GalNAc-conjugated short interfering RNA drug candidates for hepatocyte-specific gene silencing through RNAi of any target gene identified by HepNet. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 4 Kingdom Street, London, United Kingdom, W2 6BD

1.Name: Mr. Michael Anthony Bretherton ACA, B.A.
1.Title: Acting Interim CFO & Director
